CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 15, 1964, pg. 22 reads: "Helping Hand - Members of the Homewood-Brushton Athletic Association were on hand at the 913 Club last week to receive a donation of sports equipment and a check from the personnel of the 88 Bar. Shown accepting the check from Carl Jackson (second from right), manager of the bar is Stanley Allen, president of the HBAA.  Others in photo are (from left) James Smith, Isaac Saxton, Tom Ford, Elmer Charles, who helped raise the donations, and Cecil Smith. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: President of Homewood-Brushton Athletic Association Stanley Allen receiving check for sports equipment from Carl Jackson, with, from left: James Smith, Isaac Saxton, Tom Ford, Elmer Charles, and Cecil Smith looking on, standing in 913 Club
